TextList.Text: This is the intro text. Here will be explain the story setting. Feel free to edit. -The Prophet

This is the ending you get if you decide to fuck up the cult of Novum in Pestis Woods and you have a good alignment.
This is the ending you get if you decide to fuck up the cult of Novum in Pestis Woods and you have a bad alignment.
This is the ending you get if you decide to screw over your old allies in Silenda Port and you have a good alignment.
This is the ending you get if you decide to screw over your old allies in Silenda Port and you have a bad alignment.
